thread.title: Smoking gun emails reveal Blair's 'deal in blood' with George Bush
thread.title_full: Smoking gun emails reveal Blair's 'deal in blood' with George Bush

author: Grizz1
title: Smoking gun emails reveal Blair's 'deal in blood' with George Bush
text: Posts: 1,126 Smoking gun emails reveal Blair's 'deal in blood' with George Bush Leaked White House memo shows former Prime Minister's support for war at summit with U.S. President in 2002 Bombshell document shows Blair preparing to act as spin doctor for Bush, who was told 'the UK will follow our lead' Publicly, Blair still claimed to be looking for diplomatic solution - in direct contrast to email revelations But here's the kicker kids.... The memo came from Hilary's emails AND it is marked secret... 2D82FB0C 578-3277402-image-m-11_1445118359430.jpg Follow the link to the story and the memo . Quote: Originally Posted by Grizz1 Leaked White House memo shows former Prime Minister's support for war at summit with U.S. President in 2002 Bombshell document shows Blair preparing to act as spin doctor for Bush, who was told 'the UK will follow our lead' Publicly, Blair still claimed to be looking for diplomatic solution - in direct contrast to email revelations But here's the kicker kids.... The memo came from Hilary's emails AND it is marked secret... Attachment 340 Here's lesson in how to read documents, that document is marked "declassified", maybe it was secret in 2002, but it was declassified in 2012. And I'll save you the trouble of googling it, Hillary Clinton was not the Secretary of State in 2002, but she was secretary of state in 2012. What the document shows is that Tony Blair and George W. Bush were lying dirt bags. It also shows that the State Department sent the Secretary of State, a declassified document, not a lot of smoke coming from that gun....
